question.question: Under what conditions can a minor be hospitalized without consent in France?
question.option_a: When the minor is over 16 years old and has a mental health condition.
question.option_b: When the minor is under 16 years old and poses a danger to themselves or others.
question.option_c: When the minor is over 13 years old and has a physical health condition.
question.option_d: When the minor is under 13 years old and has a chronic illness.
